django.core.files.utils

Classes

FileProxyMixin

A mixin class used to forward file methods to an underlaying file

Functions

validate_file_name(name[, allow_relative_path])

Module Contents

django.core.files.utils.validate_file_name(name, allow_relative_path=False)[source]
class django.core.files.utils.FileProxyMixin[source]

A mixin class used to forward file methods to an underlaying file object. The internal file object has to be called “file”:

class FileProxy(FileProxyMixin):
    def __init__(self, file):
        self.file = file
